game_description: Step into the mysterious world of Victorian England with our thrilling micro-escape game. As a private detective, you’ll be transported back to the Dickensian town of 1893, where unrest and confusion reign supreme. Follow the trail of a ten-year-old unsolved crime, and unravel the secrets of an abandoned house. Locked closets, rustling radios, strange symbols and mysterious disappearances - this is your chance to become a true detective and solve the case. With multiple clues and puzzles scattered all over the room, your keen observation skills and decoding expertise will be put to the test. Can you find the missing pieces and unlock the truth behind this enthralling little game of secrets? -Immersive Experience- • Real: First-person perspective, you will go back to the 1890s scenes of Britain, feel the pure British atmosphere • Detective: As a private detective, you will explore the abandoned house, collect clues and discover the truth • Decryption: The room is equipped with multiple clues and mysteries, and the final mystery is waiting for you to uncover • Immersion: Explore the room and interact with various objects, as if in a real secret room to explore the case

review_2: Very much enjoying this game. I’m a fan of escape room games and this one is interesting. It’s not super difficult. It’s still a bit buggy, so hopefully that will be worked out. 2 suggestions: a way to either turn the background music/sound down and also allow the pop up text to be stabilized. It’s hard to read when it moves when you turn your head. Otherwise, I’m enjoying this so much!
